    • isAcceptable

      public boolean isAcceptable(ClusStatistic c_tstat, ClusStatistic c_pstat, ClusStatistic missing)
      Description copied from class: ClusHeuristic
      Flag that indicates whether the corresponding split is acceptable. The flag will only be checked after the best test was chosen. Useful e.g. if you want to find the best split according to the heuristic, but only keep that split if it is acceptable, and otherwise make it a leaf. The other stop criteria are checked before the best test is chosen. Is set to true by default. Overridden in the phylogeny framework.
      Overrides:
      isAcceptable in class ClusHeuristic
